data.title: Sharik Joseph - 2021 - Women's Volleyball
data.meta_description: Sharik Joseph (18) MB  - 2021 (Senior): All-Cal Pac Honorable MentionSecond in Cal Pac in block assist (98) and total blocks (118)Top 10 in Cal Pac in block

2021 Women's Volleyball

Choose a Player:

18 Sharik Joseph

Height 5-10

Year Senior

Hometown Spring Valley, California

Major Aerospace Engineering

Bio

Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

2021 (Senior):

All-Cal Pac Honorable Mention

Second in Cal Pac in block assist (98) and total blocks (118)

Top 10 in Cal Pac in block solo (20)

212 kills with a team-leading .320 hitting percentage

Recorded ten total blocks against Benedictine-Mesa on October 10

Recorded seven games of 5+ blocks

Dean's List

Honor Roll

2020 (Senior):

Season cancelled due to COVID-19 pandemic

2019 (Junior):

2nd Team All Cal Pac

Led the team in solo blocks (30) and hitting percentage (.335)

Played in all 36 matches

Six blocks in three different matches, including a three setter

Career high 15 kills against Ottawa (KS) (12/5)

Among leaders in kills (274)

2018 (Sophomore):

2018 All Cal Pac 2nd team

On the court in all 37 matches

Led the team in solo blocks (28), block assists (88), and total blocks (116)

Had 6 blocks in four different matches

Among the team leaders in kills (251)

2017 (Freshman):

On the court in 33 matches as a freshman

Led the team in solo blocks (28), block assists (74), and total blocks (102)

Career Stats

Off the Court at ERAU:

Majoring in Aerospace Engineering

High School:

Graduate of San Diego High School in San Diego, Calif.

Made State semifinals for Triple Jump 2016

CIF Finalist in Triple Jump and High Jump 2016

2X Female Field Athlete of the Year 2015-2016

League Champion in Triple, Long, and High Jump 2015-2016

3 Time Track & Field Coach's Award 2014, 2015, 2016

Two time 2nd Team Volleyball All-League 2014, 2015

Volleyball 4 time Coach's Award 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016

Sweetwater Volleyball Tournament All-Star

Volleyball League Runner Up

All Academic Team 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016-2017

Letter winner in volleyball and track & field

Obtained the B1 in the DSD German Diploma

Outstanding Theater Student

Volunteer at Father Joe's Homeless Shelter 2016-2017

San Diego High School Ambassadors 2016

Student Site Council 2015-2017

Spaghetti Club 2016

Played club with ECVBA in Lakeside, Calif.

Personal:

Full Name is Sharik Lavaughn Joseph

Born March 8, 1999 in Winterthur, Switzerland

Daughter of Grace and Dexter Joseph

Sharik has one sister Adiva

Academic Major: Aerospace Engineering

Favorite Book: The Book of Eli

Favorite Movie: IRobot

Favorite Athlete: Shaquille O'Neal

Favorite Musical Artist: B.O.B

Hobbies include: Reading, Eating, Sleeping, Robotics, looking up jokes, and watching funny videos.

Interesting Off the Court Information About Me: I used to be right handed, and then I was ambidextrous. Now I am left handed, but I play with my right.

I Chose to Attend ERAU Because: " It's my dream school. My favorite Theory of Knowledge teacher recommended ERAU to me as well"
